summary.span: e tutti i relativi membri esposti sono parte di un wrapper gestito per l'interfaccia di COM (Component Object Model).

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per altre informazioni, vedere la [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentazione.For more information, see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.
